title: unesco_heritage_Mosi-oa-Tunya___Victoria_Falls
text:
Name: Mosi-oa-Tunya / Victoria Falls. short_description:

These are among the most spectacular waterfalls in the world. The Zambezi River, which is more than 2 km wide at this point, plunges noisily down a series of basalt gorges and raises an iridescent mist that can be seen more than 20 km away.

. date_inscribed: 1989. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 25.85539. latitude: -17.92453. area_hectares: 6860. category_long: Natural. category_short: N. Country name: Zambia,Zimbabwe. Region: Africa. iso_code: zm,zw. transboundary: 1. rev_bis: .
